mosinstall.name: RSG2 Display
mosinstall.author: Jonathan DeLaigle and Jonah Braun
mosinstall.description: Usage: {rsg2_display: Template, GID} or {rsg2_display: Template, GID, paramName=value, paramName=value, ...} for as many parameters as you need to specify. Template should be the name of the template you want to use. GID should be the numerical ID representing the gallery, this can be found in the first column of the gallery listing.
